title: The Perfect Pitch: The Biography of Roger Owens, the Famous Peanut Man at Dodger Stadium
description: The story of Roger Owens, Dodger Stadium's famous Peanut Man, whose rise from hopelessness on L.A.'s inner-city streets to peanut-tossing fame in the baseball stands continues to inspire sports fans -- and non-fans -- looking for a real-life American hero.
author: Daniel S. Green
